#include<iostream>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main(){
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	for(int k=0;k<t;k++){
 
	long c;
	cin >> c;
	long its;
	cin >> its;
	
	long* items = new long[its];
	
	for(long i=0;i<its;i++){
		long tmp;
		cin >> tmp;
		items[i] = tmp;
	}
	
	long i1;
	long i2;
	
	bool found = false;
	
	for(long i=0;i<its;i++){
		for(long j=i+1;j<its;j++){
			if(items[i] + items[j] == c){
				i1 = i+1;
				i2 = j+1;
				
				found = true;
				break;	
			}	
		}
		if(found) break;
	}
	
	cout << "Shop" << k << ": " << i1 << " " << i2 << endl;	 
	
	}	
}
